title: Refund Token Suggestion
body: Maybe instead of all the proposed ideas of a time based extra refund token. Why not develop the option to purchase a refund token for say 13000 IP like a name change.

replies.body:
I think it would be a good idea. But make it cheeper for top tier cost champions. So that people don't lose IP for IP refunds (which I can see low level players doing a lot)
But yea, that way you could use a skin for your favourite champion one patch, then when they fall out of favour all of the faithless basterds can swap over to a skin for the next FotM! =D
